summary: as a terminator fan myself, i thought it would be cool to add the look of the terminator to the game. To any one that has been wanting somthing like this here it is enjoy.
descriptionHtml:
Simpliy extract into your skyrim directory.

I have also added the optional terminator red eye, that replaces the current blindeyes.

To delete go into your C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\eyes and delete the file eyeblind.dds for the eyes. As for the face same as above but this, time go into your C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\male and delete the file malehead.dds
author: xidian187
